item.title: Participate in Clinical Research
item.description: I thought I would post something similar to all of those “suffering in DKA, here’s my IV” photos that go around T1D groups occasionally, but on a POSITIVE note. When I was diagnosed with Type 1 Diabetes, I had the chance to enroll in the Extend Study, which is looking into whether a particular immune suppressant drug can help slow down the onset of T1. Even though it’s over (and I still don’t know if I got the drug or placebo), I am now in a long-term followup to track my insulin production as long as I have some.
